snippet: A 94th-minute penalty rescued a point for the Czech Republic in its 2-2 draw with Croatia as flares were thrown onto the pitch during a Euro 2016 match.
abstract: Croatia and Czech Republic play to 2-2 tie in European Championship soccer match.
lead_paragraph: A 94th-minute penalty rescued a point for the Czech Republic in its 2-2 draw with Croatia as flares were thrown onto the pitch during a Euro 2016 match.

headline.print_headline: CZECH REPUBLIC 2, CROATIA 2; Late Penalty Aids Czech Republic
